mapper.select: select * from departments order by id desc limit #{page}, #{pageSize}
select COUNT(id) as total from departments
mapper.insert: insert into departments(dept_code, dept_name, parent_id, level, path, manager_id, contact, status) values (#{deptCode}, #{deptName}, #{parentId}, #{level}, #{path}, #{managerId}, #{contact}, #{status})
mapper.update: update asset.departments set dept_code = #{deptCode}, dept_name = #{deptName}, parent_id = #{parentId}, level = #{level}, path = #{path}, manager_id = #{managerId}, contact = #{contact}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
